txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Wet skin from the lesser beasts found throughout Bree-land. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'This skin looks like it will fulfill the original request. Thank you.'

'I am told that beast skin can be used to cover padding in boots, being thinner than leather. Of course one such as yourself would want the sturdier and heavier leather stock. If you are willing, people would appreciate the effort.'
Men of Bree Task: Wet Skin
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of wet skin from lesser beasts throughout Bree-land.
Deliver the wet skin to Second-watcher Heathstraw
You have been tasked with finding wet skin from the lesser beasts making Bree-land their home. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Wet skin from the lesser beasts found throughout Bree-land.
